titleStmt.title: The differences in Scotland stil on foot. Or, The late proceedings between the Parliament and Kirk. The committee of estates enjoyning the approbation of, and conformity to what they have done in Parliament. The dehortation of the Kirk, anent the same, with their reasons or causes of days of humiliation; to keep off Gods judgments and a war between the nations.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Leybourn in Monkswel-street neer Creeple-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
